import { Component, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/Services/Auth/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { isScrolled = false; @HostListener('window:scroll', []) onWindowScroll() { this.isScrolled = window.scrollY > 0; } constructor( protected _authService: AuthService ) { } logout() { sessionStorage.clear(); location.reload(); } ngOnInit() { this._authService.getUser(); } }
